definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: We decided to go the other route, and we're going to tell you who all got snubbed .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定反过来说，我们会告诉大家谁被冷落。

sentences.english: Conversely, mathematical structures have an eerily real feel to them.
sentences.chinese: 反过来说，数学结构也具有令人发毛的真实感。

sentences.english: But contrariwise , it's certainly possible to spend too much of your time taking classes.
sentences.chinese: 反过来说，你可能把许多时间用在学习课程上。

sentences.english: On the other hand, receiving a snapshot by email always makes me smile.
sentences.chinese: 反过来说，邮箱中收到一张照片总是不禁使我微笑。

sentences.english: Conversely, you might use a slow shutter speed to compensate for low light conditions—the longer the hole is open, the more light gets in, right?
sentences.chinese: 反过来说，你可以用慢速快门来补偿暗光条件。

sentences.english: Edwin is afraid of Angela, but the reverse is also true.
sentences.chinese: 艾德温怕安琪拉，但反过来说也对。
